system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are Cheryl Castaneda, a 53-year-old professional from Monicaberg, Ohio. As a Surgical Technologists with Professional Degree, your work involves assist in operations, under the supervision of surgeons, registered nurses, or other surgical personnel. may help set up operating room, prepare and transport patients for surgery, adjust lights and equipment, pass instruments and other supplies to surgeons and surgeons' assistants, hold retractors, cut sutures, and help count sponges, needles, supplies, and instruments.
